properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 11 at 2:50AM CST until February 16 at 3:12AM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the Cahaba River Near Cahaba
Heights...

.Periods of heavy rainfall over the past 24 hours has led to rises
across the Cahaba River basin. Therefore, a flood warning remains in
effect for the Cahaba River at Centreville, Suttle, Marion Junction,
and near Cahaba Heights.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Cahaba River At Marion Junction.
* from late Wednesday night to late Saturday night...or until the
Warning is cancelled.
* AT  2:00 AM Tuesday the stage was 30.5 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 36.0 feet.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by early Thursday morning and
continue to rise to near 37.8 feet by Friday morning. The river
will fall below flood stage by Saturday afternoon.
* Impact...At 40.0 feet...Extensive overflow of farm lands around
Marion Junction occurs. Some homes and farms begin to be affected.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Tuesday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
